contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailPreviewText: Check out the latest news 📰 from the Kentico community!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailIntroContent:
Hey {!ResolveDynamicText("Recipient.FirstName","friend")!} ,

Xperience by Kentico's October 2024 Refresh is out with several exciting features like built-in multi-factor authentication and email microchannels.

As .NET 6 nears the end of its support lifecycle from Microsoft we're also re-sharing a post about Kentico's alignment with Microsoft's .NET support policies.

And, as always, we have some great content from the Kentico community. Enjoy!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailOutroContent: If you found the information in this newsletter helpful, something looks strange in your email client, or you have news, a video, or blot post to feature in a future newsletter - let us know by giving us some feedback.
